name: Ant Dance
description:
Submission for AGDG GameJam #2 with Tiny/Micro theme.

Was short on time and had to cut some gameplay content.
I didn't make any of the music in this game.

3 Fields to enter dance moves, if left blank they will be filled randomly. Small button to the right of each field also can be used to fill the field randomly.

20 different dance moves, and 20 different songs. See if you can see them all.
